longDef.en: somewhere else, or to or in a different place, position, or situation
longDef.cn: 去（或在）别处；向另一方向；向一边

examples.en: Ms Watson is away on holiday until the end of the week.
examples.cn: 沃森女士度假去了，要到周末才能回来。

examples.en: Keep/Stay away from him.
examples.cn: 离他远点。

examples.en: Just go away and leave me alone!
examples.cn: 走开，别管我！

examples.en: The sight was so horrible that I had to look/turn away.
examples.cn: 这场面太可怕了，我不得不移开视线。

examples.en: The recent flood has swept away the footbridge.
examples.cn: 最近爆发的洪水把人行桥冲垮了。

examples.en: I've given away all my old clothes to charity.
examples.cn: 我已把所有的旧衣服都捐给了慈善机构。

examples.en: Would you like your burger to eat in or take away?
examples.cn: 你的汉堡是在店里吃还是带走？

longDef.en: at a distance (of or from here)

examples.en: How far away is the station?
examples.cn: 车站离这儿有多远？

examples.en: The office is a half-hour drive away.
examples.cn: 从这儿到办公室开车去要半小时。

examples.en: We live five kilometres away from each other.
examples.cn: 我们两人的住处相隔5公里。

examples.en: Life's so much quieter away from the city.
examples.cn: 离开城市，生活清静多了。

examples.en: Oh, it's miles away (= a long distance from here).
examples.cn: 哦，远着呢。

longDef.en: in or into the usual or a suitable place, especially one that can be closed
longDef.cn: 在老地方；在适当的地方；放到，放进（尤指封闭的空间）

examples.en: Would you put the ice cream away in the freezer?
examples.cn: 你把冰激凌放到冰箱里好吗？

examples.en: My grandparents had £800 hidden away in an old shoe box.
examples.cn: 我爷爷奶奶在一个旧鞋盒子里藏了800英镑。

longDef.en: gradually until mostly or completely gone

examples.en: All the snow had melted away.
examples.cn: 雪已完全融化了。

examples.en: The music faded away as the procession moved slowly up the street.
examples.cn: 随着街上的游行队伍渐渐远去，音乐声也渐渐听不见了。

examples.en: We used to while away (= spend) the weekends at my aunt's house in the country.
examples.cn: 我们过去常常在我姑母的乡间农舍中度周末。

examples.en: We danced the night away (= until the night was over).
examples.cn: 我们跳舞跳了个通宵。

examples.en: My English exam's only a week away and I haven't even started to prepare.
examples.cn: 再有一周就要考英语了，可我还没有开始复习呢。

longDef.en: continuously or repeatedly, or in a busy way
longDef.cn: 连续不断地;一直;劲头十足地

examples.en: I was still writing away when the exam finished.
examples.cn: 考试结束时我还在拼命写个不停。

examples.en: Chris has been working away in the garden all day.
examples.cn: 克里斯在花园里一刻不停地干了一整天。

examples.en: We were chatting away at the back and didn't hear what he said.
examples.cn: 我们一直坐在后面聊天，没有听到他说什么。

longDef.en: An away match or game is played at an opposing team's sports ground.
longDef.cn: （比赛）客场的，在对方场地举行的

examples.en: We lost the away game but won both home games.
examples.cn: 我们输了客场的那场比赛，但是在主场的两场比赛都赢了。

examples.en: Everton unveiled their new yellow-and-blue away strip (= clothing worn by a team at away games).
examples.cn: 埃弗顿队公布了新款黄蓝相间条纹客场比赛服。
